subject: Sports Medicine
Coma
Alpine Skiing
lead_paragraph: Daniel Albrecht of Switzerland left an Austrian hospital saying he wants to return to top-level racing after a crash that left him comatose for three weeks. Albrecht, 25, spoke to reporters for the first time since he had brain and lung injuries in a Jan. 22 fall in Kitzbühel, Austria.
